item.title: Julie add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "I tell you, we are here on Earth to fart around, and don't let anybody tell you different." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Julie add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "I can have oodles of charm when I want to." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Julie add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Perhaps, when we remember wars, we should take off our clothes and paint ourselves blue and go on all fours all day long and grunt like pigs. That would surely be more appropriate than noble oratory and shows of flags and well-oiled guns." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Julie add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "The only difference between Hitler and Bush is that Hitler was elected." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Julie add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
Julie add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I hate to advocate drugs, alcohol, violence, or insanity to anyone, but they've always worked for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Julie add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "No sympathy for the devil; keep that in mind. Buy the ticket, take the ride...and if it occasionally gets a little heavier than what you had in mind, well...maybe chalk it off to forced conscious expansion: Tune in, freak out, get beaten." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Julie add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "It never got weird enough for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Julie add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "You won't find reasonable men on the tops of tall mountains." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Julie add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "America...just a nation of two hundred million used car salesmen with all the money we need to buy guns and no qualms about killing anybody else in the world who tries to make us uncomfortable" -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Julie add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Julie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling
